title.text: Learning complex inflectional paradigms through blended gradient inputs

abstractContent.text: Through Gradient Symbolic Computation (Smolensky and Goldrick, 2016), in which input forms can consist of gradient blends of more than one phonological realization, we propose away of deriving surface forms in complex inflectional paradigms that dispenses with direct references to inflectional classes and relies solely on relatively simple blends of input expressions.
